programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Before the presentation of their pimped Opel Kadett, BSG Racing are about to take the final steps, but there are only 6 days left. Will the guys still manage to finish the car in time?

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: At Tuning World Bodensee, BSM Racing presents its finished Opel Kadett. Its conversion will compete against the best show cars in Europe in the European Tuning Showdown. Will the Kadett manage to take the tuning crown?

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Tuning World Bodensee is a trade fair event in a class of its own. In 2013, a very special anniversary was celebrated: already 10 years earlier, the numerous tuning enthusiasts were drawn to Lake Constance for the start of the season.

programme.title: Mercedes-AMG GT S Performmaster
programme.desc: Not far from Stuttgart is the home of the tuner Performmaster who specialize in the performance optimization of Mercedes-AMG models. They turned the already more-than-potent GT S sports car into a beast.

programme.title: KTM 990 Adventure
programme.desc: It's very big and mostly comes in orange: the KTM 990 Adventure. Over rough terrain it's often driven standing up. Today, the 990 is considered the off-road specialist among travel Enduros.

programme.title: Bentley Mulsanne EWB
programme.desc: The long version of the Bentley Mulsanne is a prime example of a chauffeured limousine. With it, the British luxury car brand has set the bar extremely high when it comes to automotive comfort.

programme.title: Jeep Renegade
programme.desc: Jeep has been building SUVs since 1942. The Jeep Renegade comes from a traditional home. It is the youngest representative of the family and the most successful.

programme.title: Jeep Wrangler
programme.desc: In 2018 the fourth generation of the Wrangler was introduced. I contained state-of-the-art technology, but the rugged look remained the same. The brand works hard to maintain this silhouette since the very first Jeep ever, the Willys MB.

programme.title: Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10
programme.desc: The Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10 has its origins in the Japanese army. Its shape wonâ€™t win any beauty contests or achieve the best results in the wind tunnel, but this is not really the point with an SUV like this.

programme.title: Volvo Laplander 6x6
programme.desc: More extremes are always possible. Volvo's Laplander army vehicle has 6 wheels, 3 axles and provides space for at least 12 soldiers.

programme.title: Lancia Stratos HF
programme.desc: The Lancia Stratos with Ferrari power, the rally icon of the 1970s.

programme.title: Amphicar 770
programme.desc: The amphicar 770 is a unique and rare classic. It may not be the fastest car on the street, but it's always ready for getting in the water.

programme.title: Volkswagen Polo R WRC
programme.desc: For Volkswagen, the VW Polo R WRC was a means to an end in order to be allowed to compete in the World Rally Championship. For the homologation of the rally car, Volkswagen had to build the basic car in small series.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Since its introduction in 1983 the Opel Combo has been very successful with both craftspeople and families alike. We took a look at the updated version. Also: with the XC40, Volvo introduced a new mobility concept called Care by Volvo.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Porsche packed a lot of power into the Panamera. We took their Sport Turismo model to the Formula One track in Bahrain. In addition: BMW redesigned their 530i Touring 4-cylinder station wagon. And: an trip to Cologne in the Volvo V60.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Beside SUVs, compact and city cars are on the rise. For many people, a Kia Picanto is enough to satisfy their mobility needs. In addition: the Audi A1 offers certain features of the luxury class, but at a much higher price. And: the agile Kia Ceed GT.

programme.title: Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10
programme.desc: The Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10 has its origins in the Japanese army. Its shape wonâ€™t win any beauty contests or achieve the best results in the wind tunnel, but this is not really the point with an SUV like this.

programme.title: Cadillac CTS-V
programme.desc: Those who donâ€™t know about it will only see a dignified sedan but under the hood hides the 649 horse power 6.2 liter V8 supercharged engine of the Corvette Z06. This car is a good alternative to the Audi RS6, BMW M5 and Mercedes E63 AMG.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Audi is one of the most successful car manufacturers of the present day. The brand with the four rings stands for innovation, superior technology and unique design. Founded over 100 years ago, Audi is now a successful global player.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: In 1932, the economic crisis led to the merger of the Horch, DKW, Audi and Wanderer brands under the name Auto Union, the second largest German car manufacturer at the time, which made motor sport history with the famous Silver Arrow racing cars.

programme.title: Car History
programme.sub-title: Ford - The Beginning of the Modern Era
programme.desc: Henry Ford paved the way for the automotive revolution at the beginning of the 20th century. With the Ford Model T, the company conquered not only the USA but the whole world and made its inventor one of the richest men.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Few manufacturers have been as active in the USA and Europe as early as Ford - and with success. While the Mustang thrilled American youth, the Capri turned the heads of Europeans.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Porsche has competed in the 24-hour Le Mans classic every year since 1951. The company's prototypes have won 18 times - more often than the vehicles of any other manufacturer in the history of this racing series.

programme.title: BMW 328 SchlÃ¼ter
programme.desc: If a car arrives in a trailer, its value is usually very high. The original BMW 328 SchlÃ¼ter is already rare and expensive. But this model is a reconstruction and it is absolutely unique.

programme.title: Volvo XC60
programme.desc: The Swedish landscape is characterized by mountains, forests and lonely roads. Ideal for this off-roader. The Volvo XC60 scores with many safety features and a cool appearance.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Customised cars from the desert: in Ron's Garage in California, rolling works of art are created according to customer wishes. Plus: Mercedes-Benz transforms the G-Class into the ultimate G 63 AMG 6x6 survivalist's dream. And: the Brabus B63.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: MTM turns the RS6 into the RS6 R Clubsport. Also: Stefan KallÃ¤ne pimped a Volkswagen Lupo to the extreme. At the Tuning Expo SaarbrÃ¼cken he looks for the hottest gadgets in the car tuning scene.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The Scirocco GT-R1 from Mathilda Racing, the Bentley GT3 R and the Volkswagen Golf R. The Scirocco is a complete conversion. The Bentley GT3 R is the street version of the current GT3 racer. And the Golf R is the most powerful Golf ever.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: In Dubai, the legendary super sports car police fleet is on the hunt for speeders and parking violators. Also: the Audi S8 MTM Talladega R. And: the Alpina D5 on the race track.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The BMW 3 Series, Nissan 370 Z or Citroen DS3 are usually considered everyday cars. But in the M version, as a Nismo or as a Musketier, things get down to business in terms of performance.

programme.title: Mitsubishi Lancer Evo 10
programme.desc: The ice course on Lungauring, the Mitsubishi Lancer Evo 10 in winter training. Twelve participants in six Evos were taught the art of drifting with a four-wheel drive car. We accompanied a student on his first drifting experience.

programme.title: Toyota Corolla Levin
programme.desc: In 1970, the second generation Corolla was released in Japan. The sporty model version â€žLevinâ€œ, similar to the Volkswagen Golf GTI among the Corollas, was only made available in Japan and the United States.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: Whether itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Jaguar, Rolls Royce or Bentley, whether itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Aston Martin or McLaren, whether itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a luxury saloon, coupe or super sports car, these automotive creations from the UK combine tradition, luxury, performance and that unique British style.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: Whether itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s the Porsche 918 Spyder, the Mercedes S-Class, BMW's M6 or Audi's A8, premium cars from Germany are the benchmark when it comes to comfort, status, dynamics and driving pleasure.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: Italy is the land of fashion, design and the most exciting cars of the world. Ferrari, Lamborghini, Maserati and Alfa Romeo are considered the epitomes for breathtaking cars, designed with stunning shapes, vivacious engines and incomparable passion.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: American muscle cars are iconic vehicles, bursting with power. Whether it is the Ford Mustang, the Chevrolet Camaro or the Corvette, these cars are coveted all over the world because of their rebellious design, impeteous horsepower and stunning speed.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: Beauties like the Corvette, Mustang, Camaro or Shelby Cobra represent the American dream of freedom. These spectacular cars with their massive bonnets, lush chrome dÃƒÂ©cor and large tail fins excite enthusisasts since the 1950s.

programme.title: Bentley Bentayga
programme.desc: With the Bentley Bentayga, the traditional British brand is entering the fastest growing market segment. This world's first luxury SUV is a conglomerate of superlatives on wheels.

programme.title: Ford GT40
programme.desc: With their V8 cars, Ford showed that they were able to build race winners. The Ford GT40 was a prime example for that, especially in Le Mans.

programme.title: BMW Active Hybrid 7
programme.desc: With the Active Hybrid 7, unlike with its predecessor bearing the same model name, BMW now banks on a full hybrid, which can also be driven solely with electric power.

programme.title: Ignition GT
programme.desc: Performance meets practicality in the BMW M3 Touring. Renaultâ€™s third generation Duster makes its local debut and Ziphorah puts the Lexus RX450h through its paces.

programme.title: Buyer's Guide
programme.desc: We help a first-time buyer in find the perfect vehicle within a R300 000 budget. We search for the ideal bakkie capable of carrying heavy equipment. And we examine the cost of replacing the bearing on a VW Polo 6C

programme.title: Garage Gold
programme.desc: We head to Durban for the Concours Dâ€™Elegance. Also, Francisco meets up with Zani who has a special father-daughter story that will melt your hearts. And we have an Austin-Healey vs. an OG Super Boss in our Garage Gold Concourse competition.

programme.title: Petrolheads
programme.desc: We bring you extreme drifting action from the Wild Coast Sun! A VW Golf 6 GTI joins the Drag Kings fray. We take you on a tour of Autostadt in Germany and we meet a mellow yellow Seat Leon Cupra and its passionate owner.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: What better way is there to celebrate a stylish and powerful car and a sunny summer day than going for a cruise over the Alps to Italy in a Maserati GranCabrio MC? In addition: a Brit with a fiery temperament, the Jaguar XK-RS convertible with 550 hp. And: Mercedes AMG's SL models, uncompromising performance.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: On Patrol with the Dubai Police
programme.desc: In a city that loves to show off wealth and luxury, the Dubai police are eager to represent this image via its fleet of patrol cars that includes a Chevrolet Camaro, a Lamborghini Aventador, a Bentley GT, a Ferrari FF, an Aston Martin and a Mercedes SLS. For the first time ever, the Dubai Police Special Cars Unit allowed a television crew to accompany them on their service missions.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Aerodynamics crucially influence the performance, track stability and dynamics of a vehicle. We took the Porsche 911 Turbo S, the BMW M6 convertible and the Kelleners 330d to the test and explored the influence of different wings and spoilers.

programme.title: Audi R8 V10 plus
programme.desc: The second generation of the Audi R8. V10 naturally aspirated engine, up to 610 horsepower and 330 kilometers an hour. A supercar with a lot of character.

programme.title: Audi RS7 Sportback Performance
programme.desc: The Audi RS7 Sportback performance is the spearhead of the Audi 7 series with the acceleration values of a super sports car. But it cannot play to its strengths in hectic urban traffic.

programme.title: Volvo Laplander 6x6
programme.desc: More extremes are always possible. Volvo's Laplander army vehicle has 6 wheels, 3 axles and provides space for at least 12 soldiers.

programme.title: LIVE: IMSA - Chevrolet Grand Prix
programme.desc: LIVE: IMSA WeatherTech Sportscar Championship - Chevrolet Grand Prix

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: The BMW X5M, Audi Q7, Mercedes GLS and Porsche Cayenne Turbo are among the strongest and fastest SUVs in the world. Sports utility vehicles made in Germany are the embodiment of technical perfection, superior performance and unique comfort.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: Luxury, lifestyle and exclusivity, no other cars transport these attributes better than the SUVs by Jaguar, Range Rover, Bentley, Volvo and Infinity. These stylish and excellently equipped SUVs embody a spirit of adventure and a zest for life.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: US SUVs and pickup trucks like the Cadillac Escalade, Chevrolet Tahoe, Ford Raptor or Dodge Ram are large, powerful and luxurious and exude the feeling of unlimited possibilities and adventure.

programme.title: Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10
programme.desc: The Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10 has its origins in the Japanese army. Its shape wonâ€™t win any beauty contests or achieve the best results in the wind tunnel, but this is not really the point with an SUV like this.

programme.title: Ford GT40
programme.desc: With their V8 cars, Ford showed that they were able to build race winners. The Ford GT40 was a prime example for that, especially in Le Mans.

programme.title: Aston Martin Rapide S
programme.desc: Aston Martin is breaking new ground with the sport sedan â€“ the â€žRapide Sâ€œ. Ever since the official car of James Bond became the Aston Martin, this brand has achieved cult status. Desirable, timelessly elegant, 2-door sports coupes are the DNA. But even the venerable British brand does not escape evolution - because with the Rapide S, Aston Martin goes new ways.
